Batch class for managing chat processing

batch.Rd

Batch class for managing chat processing

Usage

batch(
  prompts = list(),
  responses = list(),
  completed = integer(0),
  state_path = character(0),
  type_spec = NULL,
  echo = character(0),
  progress_bar = NULL,
  input_type = character(0),
  max_retries = integer(0),
  initial_delay = integer(0),
  max_delay = integer(0),
  backoff_factor = integer(0),
  chunk_size = integer(0),
  workers = integer(0),
  plan = character(0),
  state = list()
)
